com.mvp4g.client.event
Interface EventFilter<E extends EventBus>

public interface EventFilter<E extends EventBus>

This interface can be implemented in order to receive events all events from an EventBus.

Classes that implement this interface are associated with an EventBus class by adding the
filter class literal to the filterClasses list in the EventBus' @Events annotation

Author:
Nick Hebner

Method Summary
 boolean filterEvent(java.lang.String eventType, java.lang.Object[] params, E eventBus)
          Filter an event
 

Method Detail

filterEvent

boolean filterEvent(java.lang.String eventType,
                    java.lang.Object[] params,
                    E eventBus)
Filter an event

Parameters:
eventType - type of the event
params - objects sent with the event
eventBus - event bus used to fire the event
Returns:
false if event should be stopped, true otherwise
